title: Shooting Stars, Carrying Dreams and Gratitude

text_block_list.text:
――Moving on, the next scene will be with me and Top 
Road-san. It seems my costume is just about finished, so I'll go get changed.
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: And one more thing, Top Road-san. While our protagonist may be the Santa King for now――

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Aida is not the only tragic protagonist, you know.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
!
Okay... Let's give it a go, then!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
――Good day, and how fare you, Sun King?
I carry with me responses from the other kings.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, so you have arrived! You have kept me waiting!
Hmm? You seem to carry with you something else...?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Indeed. You once expressed interest in the unique specialties of the other kingdoms. These are those specialties, hand-picked by the other kings. ――Presents, from us to you!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Presents...! Why, it has been ages since I was last moved by such gifts! Ahh, even if their contents are naught but stones, my heart overflows with delight!

――I rose to the station of a grand king.
I was showered in admiration and blessings...
...But that very same station drew me away from others.
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
For ages... I have lived in this palace.
...with solitude as my sole companion.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (She's... not following the script!?)

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: The true value of this production is that it was built by all our hands. It may seem you are merely playing roles, but I want to see your own heartfelt feelings into this play.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: But now, we once-solitary kings are connected! Our convictions may clash, and our borders may separate us, but we are connected nonetheless!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: ――Listen well, Santa King. It is thanks to you that we are now connected, by an irreplaceable bond.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: You did not recoil from my brilliance, and instead faced me as an equal. You are my oldest friend.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: My eternal companion!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (What should I do...? I want to say something! I want to tell her! ...But the words just won't come out...!)

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ――Take your time. Let the words come to you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Ayabe-san...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I'm sure... she'll understand.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ......Right.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
I... speak not to you, the king, but to the you I first met.
I want to thank you for being there, as you were then...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Even when I was trapped in a blizzard, my feet stuck in place. Even when I lagged behind. You still stood proudly, in all your glory...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
...and you waited for me to catch up.
Seeing your brave smile shining at the end of the tunnel is one of my greatest joys!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
――Oh, Sun King.
Let us be friends forevermore!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Yes...!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
...By the way, Ice King.
Why is it that you are here?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
!? ...I... came to meet you, Sun King.
I wished to see the letters' sender for myself.
...Is it not the same for you?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Uh, yes...! I have come from the Kingdom of Darkness!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
I can't believe my eyes! All the kings, together!
This calls for a feast! Let's begin the preparations right away!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Yes... This is it...! The same feeling I got on the turf.
The feeling that makes my body tremble, and makes my blood run hot!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: A passion all our own.

Thus concludes their weekend of hard, meaningful work.
――And soon came Christmas Day.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
It's finally time...
――Ayabe-san, give me your hand! ...Don't be shy!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...Oh... You really enjoy doing this kind of thing...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: HWAAAAGH~! GEN-MATE HANDHOLDING! THE FEELS~!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Don't stand all the way over there, Digital-chan!
Please, join in!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Ooohh... I'm s-s-so n-n-nervous~
I'm so s-sorry if I mess up...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha! What's the harm in a bit of unplanned trouble!?
Improvisation is one of the great joys of the theatre!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
I'm... getting a bad feeling about this.
Opera O, don't go too hard on the ad-libbing...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
It'll be okay, Ayabe-san!
We handled the ad-lib just fine in rehearsal, didn't we?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Besides, our relations are as the clash between the sock and buskin. We are not the type to follow clichéd expectations!
Now then, just as Ariadne and Zerbinetta before us, let us show them our grand finale!
text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
